resources.string:
Step 1 : Add Subjects
 Step 2 : Map Subjects with Days
 Step 3 : Set Notification
 Step 4 : Set Today Attendance
 Step 5 : Edit Subject or Medical Data
 Step 6 : Change Settings
 Step 7 : Developer Information


 Step 1 : Add Subjects

 		At the first step you must add your subject information to the application. Goto [Main Menu] and tap on the [Setup] (First button on the first row) button and you are able to add new subjects using Add Subject view. Add Subject name and the Subject code the press on the [ADD] button to add a new subject to database. If you are done adding new subjects press on [NEXT STEP] button.



Step 2 : Map Subjects with Days

 		Second step of the application is Mapping current subjects with days of week. Tap on the drop down menu in the top of the UI and select a day of week. At the bottom of the menu you are able to see all the subjects you have entered. Press on each subject if it should map with current selected date. All selected subjects will be highlighted. Again select a different day from the drop down menu and map subjects. Once you are done tap on [DONE CONFIGURATIONS]



Step 3 : Set Notification

 		Sometimes you forget to track your attendance daily because of some cases. To overcome this problem this application facilitate a service called Reminder. To add a reminder for a specific time of a day, goto [Settings] UI and tap on [Set Reminder] or the Switch then a time picker dialog will pop up. Choose a time from the picker and press [OK] to confirm the time then the app automatically notify you to mark your attendance daily at the specific time you have set up. You can remove the notification by tapping on the same switch or [Set Reminder] easily



Step 4 : Set Today Attendance

 		Each and every day you have to mark your attendance to analyze your attending pattern. It is just a simple case. Goto [Main Menu] and tap on the [Mark Attendance] (Second button on first row) and you will have another UI to set your attendance. In this UI you can have mapped subjects and tap once on each to mark as [Present] or tap again to mark as a [Medical Applied Date] or tap again to mark the subject as a [Absent] one. By default all the subjects are considered as absents. Once you are done tap on [Submit] to record daily attendance. Once you are done, you are unable to mark attendance for the current day. If you feel there must be a mistake of adding data, you are able to change your data manually (Step 5)



Step 5 : Edit Subject or Medical Data

 		In this section you are able to change your Subject or Medical data. Goto [Main Menu] and tap on [Edit Data] button (First button on second row) By swiping you can have different UI for change subject or medical data. Tap on each and change values.



Step 6 : Change Settings

 		In the Setting UI you are able to change your current username, current password, set a reminder and also clear the data from database. Be careful because all the data will be lost when you confirm the notification dialog.



Step 7 : Developer Information

 	H.K.Gayan Lakshitha Gunarathna
 	gliger.glg@gmail.com
Tap on each subjects to mark it as a Present, Medical applied or Absent subject Tap 1 : Present Subject Tap 2 : Medical Applied Subject Tap 3 or leave : Absent Subject
To add a new Subject, Fill the Subject Name and Course Code and tap on ADD button
To map a subject with a date, Select a date from drop-down menu and tap on a subject for mapping
Tap on Edit Data in Main Menu
Tap on each subject on Subject Editor UI or each medical in Medical editor UI Add data to fields and tap on Submit button
